actions.description: The comet makes one Slam attack and one Spit Fire attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) fire damage.
actions.name: Spit Fire

conditionImmunities: exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, unconscious
name: Murder Comet [BAM]

specialTraits.description: When the comet drops to 0 hit points, it explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
specialTraits.name: Explode

specialTraits.description: The comet doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
specialTraits.name: Flyby

specialTraits.description: The comet sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.
specialTraits.name: Illumination

specialTraits.description: The comet deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster

specialTraits.description: The comet doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
